parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The comment. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which schemas are sorted. Default value: Asc. Valid values:

*   Asc: ascending order
*   Desc: descending order

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: ParentMetaEntityId
parameters.description:
The parent entity ID. For more information, see [Concepts related to metadata entities](~~2880092~~). For the Hologres metadata crawler type, you can call the ListDatabases operation to query the settings of the `ParentMetaEntityId` parameter.

Configure the `ParentMetaEntityId` parameter in the `${EntityType}:${Instance ID or escaped URL}:${Catalog identifier}:${Database name}` format. If a level does not exist, leave the level empty.

>  If you want to query the information about a MaxCompute schema, specify an empty string at the Instance ID level as a placeholder and a MaxCompute project name at the Database name level. Make sure that the schema feature is enabled for the MaxCompute project.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field used for sorting. Default value: CreateTime. Valid values:

*   CreateTime
*   ModifyTime
*   Name
*   Type

parameters.name: Types
parameters.description: The types. Exact match is supported. If this parameter is left empty, all types are queried.
